data.partBlankContent: Several thoughts had been troubling Emily lately. She h__ not pa__ her re__ in sev____ months, and t__ landlord wo___ soon b_ demanding wh__ she ow__. Furthermore, the wea____ had be__ dreadful. She really needed someone to cheer her up.
data.answer: 最近有好几种想法一直困扰着埃米莉。她已经好几个月没交房租了，房东很快就要向她讨债了。此外，天气也很糟糕。她真的需要有人给她打气。
